criteria: Salaried Employees age should be between 18 to 60 years.
Minimum income required for urban residents is ₹20,000/month and for semi-urban and rural residents is ₹15,000/month.
Minimum Qualification for Salaried Employee should be a Bachelor's Degree.
Self Employed Individuals age should be between 18 to 65 years.
No minimum qualification required for Self Employed Individuals.
Age should be between 21 to 65 years
Minimum income should be ₹10,000/month for Salaried Employees.
Minimum income should be ₹2,00,000 per annum for Self Employed Individuals.
Age should be between 18 to 70 years
Age should be between 21 to 70 years
Minimum income should be ₹25,000/month for Salaried Employees.
Minimum income should be ₹30,000/month for Self Employed Individuals.
Age should be between 21 to 65 years
